metadata.title: CVE-2019-11936 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Various APC functions accept keys containing null bytes as input, leadingto premature truncation of input. This issue affects HHVM versions prior to3.30.12, all versions between 4.0.0 and 4.8.5, all versions between 4.9.0and 4.23.1, as well as 4.24.0, 4.25.0, 4.26.0, 4.27.0, 4.28.0, and 4.28.1.

criterions.comment: hhvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
